text: Te, kotoryye poklonyayutsya drugim bogam- pokrovitelyam, krome Allakha, podobny v svoyey slabosti i nemoshchi pauku, kotoryy ustroil sebe dom, chtoby zashchitit' sebya. No samoye slaboye, samoye neprochnoye i nepodkhodyashcheye dlya zashchity zhil'yo - eto dom pauka. Yesli by eti mnogobozhniki, ne uverovavshiye v Allakha i prizyvayushchiye pomimo Nego drugikh pokroviteley znali eto i byli razumny, oni by tak ne postupili
